title: We'd Like Your Feedback
subtitle: Help us improve the matching feature by taking this 1-minute survey.
submitError: An error occurred while submitting. Please try again later.
thankYouMessage: We'll use your feedback to deliver a better matching experience. Please stay tuned for the launch.

q1.title: Q1. What do you prioritize when looking for a trading partner?

q2.title: Q2. What experience do you expect from matching? (Multiple selections allowed)
q2.option4: Use as an opportunity for interaction (Making friends)

q3.title: Q3. What support features do you want after matching? (Multiple selections allowed)

q4.title: Q4. How often would you like to use this feature? (Optional)
